title: 252. Confessions of a Pothole Politician
description: Eric Garcetti, the mayor of Los Angeles, has big ambitions but knows he must first master the small stuff. He's also a polymath who relies heavily on data and new technologies. Could this be what modern politics is supposed to look like?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
